trans-unit.source: Provides an interface for a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor" /> to display Windows Forms or to display a control in a drop-down area from a property grid control in design mode.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService> is only available through the <xref:System.IServiceProvider.GetService%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control.
This service is typically used to display a form from the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>.
trans-unit.target: 此服务通常用于显示的窗体从<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> invokes the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> to provide a user interface for editing the value of a property, the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method is passed a reference to an <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that can typically provide an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService>.
trans-unit.target: 时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid>时，将调用<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>用于编辑属性的值提供用户界面<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>方法已传递到了引用<xref:System.IServiceProvider>，通常可以提供的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService>.

trans-unit.source: The methods of this service can be used to display dialog boxes and forms, or to show a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> within a drop down container that is shown on top of the property grid near the area of the value field whose value is being edited.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用此服务的方法，以显示的对话框和窗体，或者显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>内的下拉列表显示在其值正在编辑的值字段区域附近的属性网格之上的容器。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an example <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> that uses an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService> to display a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> for user input.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例提供一个示例<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService>以显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>为用户输入。

trans-unit.source: The following example provides an example <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> that uses an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService> to display a drop-down <xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl> for user input.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例提供一个示例<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService>以显示一个下拉列表<xref:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl>为用户输入。

trans-unit.source: Closes any previously opened drop down control area.

This method closes the drop down container area for a control that has been shown using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService.DropDownControl%2A> method, and releases the drop down container's reference to the control.
trans-unit.target: 此方法关闭的下拉列表已被证实使用的控件的容器区<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.IWindowsFormsEditorService.DropDownControl%2A>方法，并释放的下拉列表对控件的容器的引用。

trans-unit.source: The drop down list <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to open.
Displays the specified control in a drop down area below a value field of the property grid that provides this service.

The <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A> method of a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> can call this method to display a specified control in a drop down area over the property grid hosting the editor which uses this service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor.EditValue%2A>方法<xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>可以调用此方法可在属性网格承载编辑器中使用此服务上的下拉列表区域中显示指定的控件。

trans-unit.source: When possible, the dimensions of the control will be maintained.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，请将保持该控件的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible due to the screen layout, the control may be resized.
trans-unit.target: 如果这是不可能由于屏幕布局，就可能会调整控件的大小。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the control resizes neatly, you should implement docking and anchoring, and possibly any resize event-handler update code.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保该控件调整整齐大小，则应实现停靠和锚定，还可能是任何调整大小事件处理程序更新代码。

trans-unit.source: If the user performs an action that causes the drop down to close, the control will be hidden and disposed by garbage collection if there is no other stored reference to the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户执行的操作，原因将隐藏下拉列表关闭，该控件，并将其释放通过垃圾回收，如果没有任何其他存储到控件的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" /> to display.
Shows the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DialogResult" /> indicating the result code returned by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Form" />.
This method displays the specified form.
